name: Loopy Loco
description:
Loopy Loco
An entry for the Ludum Dare 46 game jam with the theme "Stuck in a loop".

Loopy the super fast locomotive is on a journey to complete all the 6 Great Loop Railways in record time. However, the tracks are busted and it's your job to fix them up so that Loopy completes all the loops by reaching the depot area at the end of each level.

How to play

Every loop has some track pieces that are misaligned. Click on a track piece to rotate through all the available options. Your goal is to fix the tracks so that there is at least a single track loop leading from start to depot area.
